metadata.title: CVE-2023-52708 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: mmc:mmc_spi: fix error handling in mmc_spi_probe() If mmc_add_host() fails, itdoesn't need to call mmc_remove_host(), or it will cause null-ptr-deref,because of deleting a not added device in mmc_remove_host(). To fix this,goto label 'fail_glue_init', if mmc_add_host() fails, and change the label'fail_add_host' to 'fail_gpiod_request'.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
